Name: MPI_Finalize
Description: MPI_Finalize shuts down the MPI library. It must be called by each process at the end of the MPI program.

Return.Description:
The error code returned from the finalisation.
- MPI_SUCCESS: the routine successfully completed.

Parameters.Name: ierror
Parameters.Description: The error code returned from the finalisation.

Parameters.Name: ierror
Parameters.Description: The error code returned from the finalisation.
